title: RB2 Security
description: Unified security dashboard for RB2 streams (alerts, ssh, process, auditd, firewall, web, modsecurity, systemd, scan, yara)

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_alerts" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT rule_name as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_alerts" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "sshd_systemd" WHERE message like '%Accepted %' GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

SELECT histogram(_timestamp, '1 minute') as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "sshd_systemd" WHERE message like '%Failed password%' OR message like '%Invalid user%' GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_firewall" WHERE decision='DENY' GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT histogram(_timestamp, '1 minute') as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_yara" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT _timestamp, rule_name, event_user_name, event_process_name, event_host_name, action_taken, rule_mode FROM "rb2_logs_alerts" ORDER BY _timestamp DESC LIMIT 200
SELECT count(distinct(host_id)) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_process" WHERE host_id is not null

SELECT regexp_replace(message,'^.* from ([0-9.]+) port .*$','$1') as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "sshd_systemd" WHERE message like '%Failed password%' GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25

SELECT regexp_replace(message,'^.* for (invalid user )?([^ ]+) from .*$','$2') as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "sshd_systemd" WHERE message like '%Failed password%' OR message like '%Invalid user%' GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25

SELECT regexp_replace(message,'^.* for ([^ ]+) from .*$','$1') as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "sshd_systemd" WHERE message like '%Accepted %' GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25

SELECT regexp_replace(message,'^.* from ([0-9.]+) port .*$','$1') as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "sshd_systemd" WHERE message like '%Accepted %' GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25

SELECT _timestamp, regexp_replace(message,'^Accepted ([^ ]+) for .*$', '$1') as method, regexp_replace(message,'^.* for ([^ ]+) from .*$', '$1') as user, regexp_replace(message,'^.* from ([0-9.]+) port .*$', '$1') as src_ip, regexp_replace(message,'^.* port ([0-9]+) .*$', '$1') as src_port FROM "sshd_systemd" WHERE message like '%Accepted %' ORDER BY _timestamp DESC LIMIT 200

SELECT _timestamp, case when message like '%Invalid user%' then 'invalid_user' else 'failed_password' end as kind, case   when message like '%Invalid user%' then regexp_replace(message,'^.*Invalid user ([^ ]+) from .*$', '$1')   else regexp_replace(message,'^.*Failed password for (invalid user )?([^ ]+) from .*$', '$2') end as user, regexp_replace(message,'^.* from ([0-9.]+) port .*$', '$1') as src_ip, regexp_replace(message,'^.* port ([0-9]+) .*$', '$1') as src_port FROM "sshd_systemd" WHERE message like '%Failed password%' OR message like '%Invalid user%' ORDER BY _timestamp DESC LIMIT 200
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_process" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT process_name as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_process" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_process" WHERE process_name = 'sudo' GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

SELECT _timestamp, host_name, user_name, process_name, process_executable, process_args, process_pname, process_pid, process_ppid FROM "rb2_logs_process" WHERE process_name in ('nc','netcat','ncat','socat','curl','wget','python','python3','perl','ruby','php','bash','sh','ssh','scp','sftp','sudo','su') ORDER BY _timestamp DESC LIMIT 200

SELECT _timestamp, host_name, user_name, process_name, process_executable, process_args FROM "rb2_logs_process" WHERE process_executable like '/tmp/%' OR process_executable like '/dev/shm/%' ORDER BY _timestamp DESC LIMIT 200
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "auditd" WHERE audit_syscall_syscall = '59' AND audit_syscall_success = 'no' GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "auditd" WHERE audit_syscall_syscall = '59' AND audit_syscall_euid = '0' AND audit_syscall_auid >= '1000' AND audit_syscall_auid != '4294967295' GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

SELECT audit_syscall_comm as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "auditd" WHERE audit_syscall_syscall = '59' AND audit_syscall_success = 'no' GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25

SELECT _timestamp, audit_syscall_comm, audit_syscall_exe, audit_syscall_auid, audit_syscall_uid, audit_syscall_euid, audit_syscall_success, audit_syscall_exit FROM "auditd" WHERE audit_syscall_syscall = '59' AND audit_syscall_success = 'no' ORDER BY _timestamp DESC LIMIT 200
SELECT decision as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_firewall" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC
SELECT saddr as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_firewall" WHERE decision='DENY' GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25
SELECT daddr as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_firewall" WHERE decision='DENY' GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25
SELECT peer_ip as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_firewall" WHERE decision='DENY' GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "nginx" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT client as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "nginx" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25
SELECT request as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "nginx" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25
SELECT status as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "nginx" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 15
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "apache" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT status as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "apache" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 15
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "modsecurity" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT host_ip as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "modsecurity" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25
SELECT path as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "modsecurity" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25
SELECT status as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "modsecurity" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 15
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_systemd" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT syslog_identifier as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_systemd" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_scan" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT _timestamp, host_name, module_name, prog_name, flag, description, message FROM "rb2_logs_scan" ORDER BY _timestamp DESC LIMIT 200
SELECT rule as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1" FROM "rb2_logs_yara" GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC LIMIT 25
SELECT _timestamp, host_name, rule, path, pid, action_taken FROM "rb2_logs_yara" ORDER BY _timestamp DESC LIMIT 200
